aco.name: Ant Colony Optimization
aco.short: Swarm intelligence inspired by ant foraging behavior.
aco.long:
ACO mimics ant colony behavior through:
- Pheromone trail deposition and evaporation mechanisms
- Probabilistic path selection based on pheromone intensity
- Positive feedback reinforcement for good solutions
- Adaptive balance between exploration and exploitation
- Collective intelligence through swarm coordination

coa.name: Coati Optimization Algorithm
coa.long:
COA operations include:
- Attack phase: Directed exploration of new areas
- Follow phase: Exploitation of known good solutions
- Adaptive transition between search strategies
- Population-based information sharing
- Dynamic parameter adjustment during iterations

do.name: Dandelion Optimizer
do.long:
Key DO mechanisms:
- Rising phase: Global exploration using Lévy flights
- Descending phase: Local refinement through spiral search
- Wind-driven random walk patterns
- Adaptive height control for search intensity
- Population-based seed dispersion modeling

gto.name: Gorilla Troops Optimizer
gto.long:
GTO features:
- Migration phase: Wide exploration of new territories
- Follow silverback: Exploitation of leader's solution
- Challenge phase: Solution diversity maintenance
- Social hierarchy-based position updates
- Adaptive leadership challenge probability

hba.name: Honey Badger Algorithm
hba.long:
HBA core operations:
- Digging phase: Intensive local search patterns
- Honey-finding phase: Global guided exploration
- Dynamic intensity adjustment
- Smell intensity-based solution ranking
- Adaptive balance between random and directed moves

rsa.name: Reptile Search Algorithm
rsa.long:
RSA key processes:
- Encircling phase: Solution space exploration
- Hunting phase: Focused exploitation
- Evolutionary momentum preservation
- Prey tracking through fitness gradients
- Adaptive transition between search modes

sto.name: Siberian Tiger Optimization
sto.long:
STO mechanisms:
- Territorial marking: Solution space partitioning
- Stealthy approach: Gradual solution refinement
- Explosive attack: Rapid convergence to prey
- Prey tracking through fitness scent
- Adaptive search radius contraction

poa.name: Pelican Optimization Algorithm
poa.long:
POA operations:
- Diving phase: Vertical exploration of solution space
- Scooping phase: Horizontal exploitation
- Fish concentration modeling (fitness density)
- Collaborative hunting through population coordination
- Adaptive wing span control (search range)

hoa.name: Hippopotamus Optimization Algorithm
hoa.long:
HOA features:
- Pod movement: Coordinated group exploration
- Territorial defense: Local search refinement
- Dominance display: Solution quality competition
- River current modeling: Fitness gradient utilization
- Night foraging: Directed random exploration

fla.name: Fick's Law Algorithm
fla.long:
FLA processes:
- Concentration gradient calculation
- Diffusion probability modeling
- Random walk exploration
- Fitness-driven particle movement
- Adaptive diffusion coefficient adjustment

rime.name: Rime-ice Optimization
rime.long:
RIME operations:
- Soft rime phase: Global exploration
- Hard rime phase: Local exploitation
- Freezing probability calculation
- Structural stability evaluation
- Temperature-controlled phase transitions

avoa.name: African Vultures Optimization
avoa.long:
AVOA key processes:
- Carcass location: Fitness-based area selection
- Spiral flight: Intensive local search
- Territorial competition: Solution diversity maintenance
- Satiety-based exploration control
- Adaptive Lévy flight exploration

cheetah.name: Cheetah Optimizer
cheetah.long:
Cheetah mechanisms:
- Sprint phase: Accelerated convergence
- Rest phase: Energy-efficient local search
- Prey tracking: Fitness gradient utilization
- Adaptive velocity control
- Energy conservation management

rainbow.name: Rainbow Optimization Algorithm
rainbow.long:
ROA features:
- Wavelength-based exploration strategies
- Prism effect exploitation intensification
- Light intensity fitness evaluation
- Spectral dispersion modeling
- Adaptive refraction index control

pfo.name: Polar Fox Optimization
pfo.long:
PFO key processes:
- Behavioral groups:
  • Explorer
  • Follower
  • Balanced
  • Conservative
- Time-adaptive parameters (exploration to exploitation)
- Capacity repair enforcement
- Stagnation-triggered mutations
- Dynamic group weighting
